content:
ATLANTA, Aug. 13, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- GLO24K, a U.S.-based global beauty brand, proudly announces the launch of its latest innovation: the Bionic 7-Color LED Eye Care Mask, a cutting-edge device designed to target the delicate and sensitive skin around the eyes. This advanced beauty tool combats visible signs of aging—such as puffiness, under-eye bags, dark circles, wrinkles, and fine lines—through the power of NASA-inspired LED technology.

As a pioneer in the LED beauty device market, GLO24K developed this tool to deliver professional-level skin rejuvenation from the comfort of home. With 108 high-performance LED diodes and 7 targeted light colors, the Bionic Eye Mask provides customized, results-driven care that surpasses most products on the market.

Why LED Technology Works

Originally developed by NASA to accelerate healing in space, LED (Light Emitting Diode) therapy has since been embraced by dermatologists for its ability to stimulate collagen production and cell regeneration—without pain, downtime, or invasive procedures.

Each light color in the GLO24K Bionic Eye Mask delivers a specific benefit:

In just 3 minutes per session, several times a week, users will notice firmer, healthier-looking skin around the eyes.

What Makes GLO24K Better Than the Competition

Unlike most eye masks that use a single LED color and fewer than 50 diodes, the GLO24K Bionic Eye Mask is packed with 108 premium LED lights and offers 7 distinct color modes—providing a more comprehensive, targeted treatment. It also includes a vibration mode to improve blood flow and increase product absorption—features that most competing products simply don't offer.
• Unisex and suitable for all skin types
• Designed with durability and ease-of-use in mind

At a comparable price, GLO24K delivers more technology, better results, and a luxury experience without the luxury markup. It's where value meets performance.

Celebrity-Approved Skincare Tech

LED light therapy is no longer a hidden secret—celebrities like Kourtney Kardashian, Jessica Alba, Chrissy Teigen, and Victoria Beckham regularly use LED masks in their routines. Top Hollywood facialists, including Joanna Vargas and Shani Darden, rely on this technology to deliver red-carpet-ready results to their A-list clients.

scraped_sources.text:
Bionic 7 Color LED Eye Care Mask
Powered by 108 high-quality LED diodes that emit light in seven colors, the GLO24K Bionic 7 Color LED Eye Care Mask utilizes innovative and advanced technologies to battle the visible signs of the aging process such as wrinkles, fine-lines, crow's feet, and under-eye puffiness around the eyes for a radiant, youthful appearance.
Combat visible signs of aging around the eyes—wrinkles, fine lines, puffiness, dark circles, and crow’s feet—with our innovative Bionic 7-Color LED Eye Care Mask. Featuring 108 high-quality LED diodes, it emits 7 colors at different wavelengths, each delivering targeted skin benefits to rejuvenate and revive the delicate eye area for a radiant, youthful appearance. The mask also includes a vibration mode for enhanced results. The GLO24K Bionic Eye Mask is lightweight, rechargeable, easy to use, travel-friendly, and unisex. Use as needed, up to 3 minutes per application per day. Suitable for all skin types.
Below are the skin care benefits that are associated with each light and its respective wavelengths in nm:
- Green Light (530-540 nm) – associated with soothing and calming the skin and for balancing it. Also can assist with sagging skin and other visible signs of the aging process.
- Red Light (620-630 nm) – associated with anti-aging and age-defying benefits, more rejuvenated and radiant appearance, and battling the visible signs of the aging process.
- Light Blue Light (495-510 nm) – associated with improvement in the skin's general condition and appearance and can help in balancing and purifying the skin.
- Yellow Light (565-575 nm) – associated with skin stimulation and rejuvenation for a more radiant and revitalized appearance.
- Purple Light (390-405 nm) – associated with purifying and balancing the skin. It can assist with skin regeneration and with battling the visible signs of the aging process.
- Clear Light (450-460 nm) – associated with processes that can assist in healing and renewal of skin cells and with improving and balancing overall skin's conditions.
